name: Rencheng Luxi Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shandong Lineng Luxi Mine Industry Co Ltd

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. The Rencheng Luxi Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shandong Province, specifically in the city of Jining, Rencheng District

operators: Shandong Lineng Luxi Mine Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: Shandong Lineng Luxi Mine Industry Co Ltd operates the mine, which is fully owned by Yankuang Group Co Ltd.
